channel.title: My client wont jar to save my life
channel.description:
Okay so I am trying to make my new client a jar but it will not work. I have done this in the past and am not a complete noob with java. Can anyone please help me ill post my run.bat too
[code]@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_45/bin/java.exe" -cp bin;lib/gluegen-rt.jar;lib/jogl.jar; Main @pause [/code]
If anyone can help it would be greatly appreciated.
*EDIT* I fixed it, my main-class was not capitalized. This can be closed
